lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why did the writer not get off the bus at Woodford Green?
lyrics.translation: 为什么作家没有在伍德福德绿地下车？

lyrics.text: I love travelling in the country, but I don't like losing my way.
lyrics.translation: 我喜欢在乡下旅行，但我不喜欢迷路。

lyrics.text: I went on an excursion recently, but my trip took me longer than I expected.
lyrics.translation: 我最近去旅行了，但是我的行程比我预期的要长。

lyrics.text: I'm going to Woodford Green, I said to the conductor as I got on the bus, but I don't know where it is.
lyrics.translation: 我要去伍德福德绿地，我在上车时对售票员说，但我不知道它在哪里。

lyrics.text: I'll tell you where to get off, answered the conductor.
lyrics.translation: 售票员回答说：“我会告诉您在哪儿下车。”

lyrics.text: I sat in the front of the bus to get a good view of the countryside.
lyrics.translation: 我坐在公共汽车的前部，以便更好地欣赏乡村风光。

lyrics.text: After some time, the bus stopped.
lyrics.translation: 过了一会儿，公共汽车停了下来。

lyrics.text: Looking round, I realised with a shock that I was the only passenger left on the bus.
lyrics.translation: 环顾四周，我震惊地意识到我是公交车上唯一的乘客。

lyrics.text: You have to get off here, the conductor said.
lyrics.translation: 你必须在这里下车，售票员说。

lyrics.text: This is as far as we go.
Is this Woodford Green? I asked.
lyrics.translation: 这是伍德福德绿地吗？我问道。

lyrics.text: Oh dear, said the conductor suddenly.
I forgot to put you off.
It doesn't matter, I said. I'll get off here.
lyrics.translation: 没关系，我说。我在这里下车。

lyrics.text: We're going back now, said the conductor.
lyrics.translation: 我们现在要回去了，售票员说。

lyrics.text: Well, in that case, I prefer to stay on the bus, I answered.
lyrics.translation: 好的，在那种情况下，我宁愿待在公交车上，我回答道。
